catalog_info.title: Biology of the Fungi
catalog_info.notes: There is a weekly laboratory, and several afternoon field trips are required (dates to be announced).
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Life Sciences 1a and 1b or permission of instructor.
catalog_info.description: This course explores the fascinating diversity of the kingdom fungi, including evolution, ecology and morphology. All of the major groups of fungi, from smuts to molds, will be included. Students use a variety of techniques to learn about these organisms and their activities.
